description: Maby of some use for me
This is not an app. After installation, it opens in a pdf document viewer. I am not sure how the book is but it is not an app and should not be listed in the software section at all.
summary: It is not an app. But a book

description:
Best place for it is here. I would not have found it otherwise.

On the other hand, I would have preferred an EPUB or similar. PDFs can be hard to read sometimes.

Well written concise information.
Agree, it is not an app, yet I wouldn't have known about it.
Appreciation for publishing hard work in the public domain.
Does this pose the question for an additional category on books? I think so.

I am new to Python and used Ubuntu/Linux for years but not at a professional level. This is a coherent and thorough introduction on getting started in science, programming, engineering, or as a hobbyist. Thank you, and I hope to make my own contribution(s) to the Community as useful as this document is to me.
summary: Outstanding text for getting started in (Python) Programming
